name: Kelso Ladies Chili
author: St. Augustine Cafeteria

ingredients.name: c. and 1 tsp. salt, or as desired

instructions: Put ground beef and spices in pot and brown well. Stir constantly or it will stick. When brown, add tomato juice and pinto beans. Bring to a boil. Then add sugar. Stir constantly or it will burn and stick very fast. Use French's brand spices. This makes a very large pot full.
